unnormalised: I remember when I first started my business, the whole process of getting a GSTIN was so confusing! I had to submit my PAN card details, my company's CIN, and even my TAN number. Then there was all this talk about IEC codes and registration certificates - felt like I was drowning in alphanumeric soup! Took me almost a month and several visits to the GST Seva Kendra to finally get everything sorted. Now I tell every new entrepreneur, get your TIN sorted ASAP!
normalised: I remember when I first started my business, the whole process of getting a G-S-T-I-N was so confusing! I had to submit my P-A-N card details, my company's C-I-N, and even my T-A-N number. Then there was all this talk about I-E-C codes and registration certificates - felt like I was drowning in alphanumeric soup! Took me almost one month and several visits to the G-S-T Seva Kendra to finally get everything sorted. Now I tell every new entrepreneur, get your T-I-N sorted A-S-A-P!
